Content:: Mick van Dijke (born 15 March 2000) is a Dutch professional racing cyclist,[2] who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam Team Jumbo–Visma.[3] His twin brother Tim van Dijke also rides for the same formation.[4] Van Dijke was contracted to join UCI WorldTeam Team Jumbo–Visma in the 2022 season, having signed a contract in July 2021.[5] After showing promise with great results in 2021, it was announced that he would make an immediate transfer to the World Tour Team from early September for the remaining of the season and the following three years.[6] This biographical article related to Dutch cycling is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
